modName: Arya Stark Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][center][color=#38761D]ARYA STARK FOLLOWER [/color]

[size=3][color=#6aa84f]Arya is a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.[/color]
[color=#000000]REPORT ME ANY ISSUES PLEASE..[/color]
[size=3][size=6]
[color=#980000]O[color=#d8d8d8]H[/color].. [color=#d8d8d8]MERRY[/color] CHRISTMAS [color=#d8d8d8]GUYS[/color]![color=#d8d8d8]![/color]![/color][/size]
[color=#3d85c6]
[Follower detail][/color]
[/size]

Race : Breton
Level : 24
Voice : Young Eager
Body : UNP
Textures: Pride of Valhalla - Super HD Skin Set for UNP by Dracofish aka MelissaGT
(Midgard version)

Location : Jorrvaskr - Whiterun
Combat Style : combat assassin
[/color][size=2][size=3][color=#38761D]She is Merriable and unkillable[/color]
